messages.content: You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
How many domains were created on 10/26/2023?

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST 'https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_count' -d '{"query": {"bool": {"filter": [{"term": {"first_seen.value": "2023-10-26"}}]}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
Please give me 10 domains with a risk score of 95+ created in the last 2 days

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET 'https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_search?size=10' -d '{"_source": ["domain", "first_seen.value", "domain_risk.risk_score"], "query": {"bool": {"filter": [{"range": {"first_seen.value": {"gte": "now-2d"}}}, {"range": {"domain_risk.risk_score": {"gte": 95}}}]}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
Please give me 10 domains with the most guided pivot's

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET 'https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_search' -d '{"size": 10, "_source": ["domain", "first_seen.value", "domain_risk.risk_score"], "query": {"match_all": {}}, "sort": [{"pivot_score": {"order": "desc"}}]}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
How many .com domains were registered yesterday?

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET "https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_count" -d '{"query": {"bool": {"must": [{"range": {"first_seen.value": {"gte": "now-1d/d","lt": "now/d"}}},{"term": {"tld": {"value": "com"}}}]}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
How many domains were registered in Cameroon in the last day?

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET "https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_count" -d '{"query": {"bool": {"must": [{"range": {"first_seen.value": {"gte": "now-1d/d","lt": "now/d"}}},{"term": {"admin_contact.country.value.keyword": "cm"}}]}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
How many domains contain puny codes in the last 24 hours?

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET "https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_count" -d '{"query": {"bool": {"must": [{"range": {"first_seen.value": {"gte": "now-1d/d","lt": "now/d"}}},{"wildcard": {"whois_url.keyword": "*xn--*"}}]}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
How many domains are hosted in Russia?

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET "https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_count" -d "{\"query\": {\"bool\": {\"must\": [{\"script\": {\"script\": {\"source\": \"def ips = ['ip1', 'ip2', 'ip3', 'ip4', 'ip5']; for (ip in ips) { if (doc[ip + '.country_code.value.keyword'].size() > 0 && doc[ip + '.country_code.value.keyword'].value == 'ru') { return true; } } return false;\"}}}]}}}"
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
Show me up to 10 domains with paypal in the domain name

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET 'https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_search?size=10' -d '{"_source": ["domain"], "query": {"wildcard": {"domain": "*paypal*"}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
Please show me domains that are redirecting to google

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET 'https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_search' -d '{"_source": ["domain"], "query": {"wildcard": {"redirect_domain.value.keyword": "*google*"}}}'
You are a helpful AI DNS assistant working for DomainTools.
How many domains are resolving with 200 response?

curl -u elastic:lkrgllG4E1F12Qk1KA5uRJzr -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET 'https://dt-elastic.es.us-central1.gcp.cloud.es.io/se_engine_*/_count' -d '{"query": {"bool": {"filter": [{"term": {"website_response": 200}}]}}}'
